name: Mandapa, A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
priceRange: Rs 37,213 - Rs 83,908 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)

address.Street: Jl. Kedewatan, Banjar Kedewatan Gianyar, Bali

reviews: This was our 4th trip to Bali and we truly fell in love with the Mandapa. The landscaping of the gardens, the views, decoration of our villa and the common areas, quality of the food in the Sawah and Kubu restaurants and the incredible service...

This is just amazing hotels where everything is perfect. Atmosphere,Decoration, Service, Food. Just paradise. It’s pricey but this kind of experience is priceless. Highly recommend. We will come back for sure ! Thank you Mandapa Team for amazing stay and your hospitality.

I just want to thank the entire crew for making me and my family one of the greatest experience ever . The crew in this hotel is the so friendly and kind every time with a smile . Each time we want something they did...

This was by far my best stay anywhere ever. From the first minute we arrived until the last farewell, we were welcomed like royals. The suites are amazing, and OMG the views! The rooms super spacious, amazing views. And I had a peek at the...

Although we weren't guests at the hotel we decided to lunch at the Sawah Restaurant at Mandapa. An excellent meal - great location, superb service, wonderful cocktails and lovely food. The dishes were outstanding versions of, for the most part, Balinese favourites.
